game

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object

    Class used for running major events in the poker game and interact with all the players of the game.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  Game.BettingRound
      The betting rounds in Texas hold'em.
      static class  Game.StateOfPlayers
      The possible states the players as a group can have during the poker game.

      • smallBlind

        private int smallBlind
        Value of the small blind at the moment

      • minimumRaise

        private int minimumRaise
        The minimum amount any player is allowed to raise. In this game, the rules are that a player has to raise at least as much as the previous raise in the same round

      • latestRaise

        private int latestRaise
        Keeps track on how big the latest raise was.

      • highestBid

        private int highestBid
        The highest, total amount of chips that any player has bet during the betting round. All the other players have to put in this amount of chips to continue playing the current round.

      • playedRounds

        private int playedRounds

        Play one round of poker.

        Function used for resetting variables.

      • updateStateOfPlayers

        private void updateStateOfPlayers()
        Remove the players that are out of the game. Reset the state of the other players.

      • dealHoleCards

        private void dealHoleCards()
        Gives each player two cards (i.e. the hole cards).

      • dealCommunityCards

        private void dealCommunityCards()
        Deal the cards on the table (i.e. the community cards).

      • showCommunityCards

        private void showCommunityCards()
        This function prints 3, 4 or 5 community cards, depending on how far in the round the game is.

        private void updateBettingRound()
        Updates the betting round.

        Update the main pot by collecting all the chips on the table.

        Update the side pot.
        Parameters:
        chips - - number of chips added to the side pot.

        Move big and small blind to the next players.

        Update the value of big and small blind.
        Parameters:

        big - - new value of big blind.

      • updateDealer

        private void updateDealer()
        Switch the dealer role, so that the next player becomes the dealer.

      • makeMoves

        private void makeMoves()
        Make the moves of the players.

      • showPlayersStatus

        private void showPlayersStatus(Player player)
        Prints the status of a player.
        Parameters:
        player - - the player who gets its status printed out.

      • chooseNextMove

        private void chooseNextMove(Player player)
        The player chooses the move (among the possible moves) she/he wants to make.
        Parameters:
        player - - the player who is going to choose which move to make.

      • bet

        private void bet(Player player)
        Makes a player bet some of his/her chips.
        Parameters:
        player - - the player that is making the bet.

      • call

        private void call(Player player)
        Makes a player call the bet that is on the table, i.e. put ih the chips needed to join the game.
        Parameters:
        player - - the player who is calling the bet or calling the raise.

      • raise

        private void raise(Player player)
        Makes a player raise, i.e. put in even more chips than is necessary to join the game.
        Parameters:
        player - - the player who is making the raise.

      • goAllIn

        private void goAllIn(Player player)
        Makes a player go all in.
        Parameters:
        player - - the player who is going all in.

      • setHand

        public void setHand(Player player)
        Method that computes the rank of each possible combination of the five cards on the table plus the two cards a player has. The highest of those ranks is saved in the attribute 'rank' in the attribute 'hand' of the player.
        Parameters:
        player - - a player in the game.

      • determineWinner

        public int[] determineWinner()
        Determines which player who has the best hand.
        Returns:
        The ID(s) of a player/players with the best hand.
